name: Kraft Printed Food Delivery Paper Bags

breadcrumb.label: Kraft Printed Food Delivery Paper Bags

description: Engineered for the food delivery revolution—our sturdy, eco-friendly paper bags ensure your meals arrive fresh and in style.
highlights: ♻️ 100% Eco-Friendly — Made from recyclable, biodegradable kraft paper
📏 Custom Sizes Available — Fit your unique packaging needs
💪 Built for Daily Use — Strong 120 GSM paper holds up to 5kg
🖨️ Brandable Surface — Supports single-color or multi-color printing

faqs.q: Can I customize this product?
faqs.a: Yes, custom printing and sizing are available.

faqs.q: What is the minimum order quantity?
faqs.a: Minimum order starts at 500 units.

assurance.title: Eco-Friendly Materials
assurance.desc: Made from recyclable and biodegradable kraft paper using food-safe ink and glue.

assurance.title: Pan-India Delivery Coordination
assurance.desc: We deliver across India through trusted third-party logistics partners. Shipping method and cost depend on product type, quantity, and location. We coordinate dispatch and provide tracking details to ensure a smooth and transparent delivery experience.

assurance.title: Quality Checked
assurance.desc: Each batch is inspected for strength, finish, and print clarity to meet consistent quality standards.

assurance.title: Made in India
assurance.desc: Proudly made in India using locally sourced materials to support regional suppliers and minimize environmental impact.

useCases: Ideal for cloud kitchens delivering hot meals
Perfect for food delivery platforms like Zomato & Swiggy
Suitable for eco-conscious restaurants and takeaways
shippingInfo: Shipping across India via VRL and other logistics partners. Charges to be borne by the customer.
availability: This is a regular product. Delivery timelines vary based on order size, paper availability, printing method, and design approval.
notes: All prices are ex-factory and exclude shipping costs.
Shipping coordination handled by us; shipping cost confirmed post-inquiry.
Lead time typically ranges between 3–10 business days depending on customization requirements.
Production timelines vary if multi-color printing or special paper sourcing is required.
usecases: Ideal for cloud kitchens delivering hot meals
Perfect for food delivery platforms like Zomato & Swiggy
Suitable for eco-conscious restaurants and takeaways
